definition: (coll.) large bus/coach/(abbr. for 大型巴士)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail

sentences.english: Thanks to Manchester City Council, he will never have to sit through another open-top bus parade.
sentences.chinese: 感謝曼徹斯特市政府，他可以不用在敞蓬大巴上慶祝。

sentences.english: He even walked us to the airport bus station on the day of our departure.
sentences.chinese: 走的時候還帶我們去機場大巴站。

sentences.english: Official Opening of the new school at Toa Payoh.
sentences.chinese: 培羣在大巴窯校址舉行新校舍落成典禮。

sentences.english: An open-topped bus ride became an essential part of the journey back from the Final.
sentences.chinese: 從歸來的旅途中，趟篷大巴旅行成爲重要部分。

sentences.english: There is also more flexibility to change your ticket than you get with airline or rail travel.
sentences.chinese: 大巴也比飛機或者火車實現了更加靈活的換票服務。

sentences.english: Inter-Provincial shuttle from Beijing to Qinhuangdao is provided.
sentences.chinese: 從北京首都機場到秦皇島可以乘坐機場大巴。

sentences.english: So he went on hostaging a bus full of foreign individuals.
sentences.chinese: 所以他劫持了一輛載滿外國遊客的旅行大巴。

sentences.english: Source rocks are widely developed in foreland of Daba Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 大巴山前陸構造發育多套烴源巖。

sentences.english: The big bus filled with passengers suddenly stopped at my door.
sentences.chinese: 載滿了乘客的大巴忽然停在我家門口。

sentences.english: Have you been to the International Bazaar?
Where do I get the bus for the airport?
sentences.chinese: 什麼地方我可搭乘往機場的大巴？

sentences.english: Dabashan Mountain frontal border is a platform depression on the north verge of Upper Yangzi Platform.
sentences.chinese: 大巴山前緣爲上揚子準地臺北緣的一個臺緣拗陷。

sentences.english: After a tense standoff, the marchers agreed to board government buses to Deyang, the county seat.
sentences.chinese: 經過一番緊張的對峙，示威者同意坐上去德陽的大巴。

sentences.english: Would the driver see them in time?
sentences.chinese: 大巴司機能不能及時看見他們呢？

sentences.english: We ride buses and trains and walk.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐大巴或者火車或者步行。

sentences.english: Convert the gas into fuel for trucks and buses.
sentences.chinese: 將甲烷轉化成卡車和大巴使用的燃料。

definition: shuttle bus ferrying passengers between train stations on two different rail lines
to take the car, bus, train etc
departure (of a coach or train)/to dispatch a vehicle
